Author: zomb1e-dust
Text: Those buff football players aren't as healthy as people think! Just cuz it's muscle instead of fat doesn't make it all better.

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I can so relate. I’m down 25 pounds so far and my body fat percentage as reported by my scale has only dropped like 1%. (And my BF% is depressingly high) Anecdotally, the impedance-based measurement of body composition that most home scales use isn’t especially accurate. That doesn’t really make me feel any better though.  I dunno. My main hope is that attaining some lean gains at the gym will help.
